description.value: When two or more servitors, such as the character's Servitor Comrades, assist them in a Tech-Use Test via the Servo-Arm Comrade Advance, they gain an additiional +5 to the test per servitor assisting beyond the first.

system.benefit: When two or more servitors, such as the character's Servitor Comrades, assist them in a Tech-Use Test via the Servo-Arm Comrade Advance, they gain an additiional +5 to the test per servitor assisting beyond the first.
